1.content: Let’s start with where you are: Home or at school?
1.title: The start

12.content:
You are excited to be a senior. One last year of high school and you’re home free. Today is the second week of school for the year and the councilor wants to speak with you. You think it’s about how your doing or your future plans but no one has told you more than to meet with her so there you are sitting outside her office an hour before school let’s out on a Tuesday.

Finally the door opens and the councilor steps out and notices you. “Hello Isabelle.” She says cheerfully. “I’m Mrs. Harvest.”

“Hi.” You answer back and you shake her hand.

“Why don’t we go inside my office and we can talk.”

When your both settled in her office Mrs. Harvest looks a little concerned at you but doesn’t lose her cheerful smile. “Do you know why you were asked to see me?” You shake your head, confused. “Ive been looking at your transcripts for the past couple of years and noticed a couple of things. I did some more digging and it would seem that the pattern I noticed for the past three years is also present for most of grade school as well.”

“Pattern? Are you suggesting I cheat in school?” You ask upset.

“No your grades aren’t good enough to accuse you of cheating. That’s the problem. You’ve barely passed ever single year of school. I was talking to some of your teachers and they were of the opinion that you really should have repeated last year.”

“What are you saying?” You ask nervously.

“School is almost out for the day but the principal and I both agree, and we spoke with your mother, and tomorrow you will head to the library instead of your classes so you can take a placement exam.”

“Placement exam?”

“We’re going to see what grade you belong in.”

“What grade? I’m 18 I’m a senior I’m graduating this year!”

“If you belong in 12th grade then that’s what the test will show.”
12.title: School

121.content:
Your sitting in the library in front of the exam that will determine whether you continue the year as a senior or not. The librarian was watching you after the councilor had explained the directions and rules of the test. She had told you to just do your best and that you’d have a bathroom break once every hour but weren’t allowed to leave the library unless at the designated time. She also said that you had until lunch to finish and then they’d grade it and they would know where you belong before you left school for the day.

It was five minutes before lunch when you felt the urgency to go to the bathroom. You hadn’t felt the need to go before so hadn’t taken advantage of the bathroom breaks but now you couldn’t wait.

“Are you sure I can’t go to the bathroom?” you plead squirming in desperation.

“You only have five more minutes. You should be able to hold it for that long especially since the bathroom is right next to the library.” The librarian says with a shake of the head.

You last another 3 minutes before your bladder gives out and there’s pee soaking your pants and the floor beneath you.

The librarian gives you a dirty look. “You could t hold it another 2 minutes? Look at the floor! At the mess you made!”

You blush and tears are pricking your eyes as you fight the urge to cry. “I’m sorry.” You say. “I’ll clean it up.”

“No you’ll go to the nurse.” She points angrily in the direction you infer your supposed to go because it in the opposite direction you should go otherwise. You get up and rush out hoping no one will see you in your wet pants.

Does someone see you?
121.title: The exam

choices: Kaylee, your rival, who would never let you live this down
Madison, your best friend, who you wouldn't want to let them find out.
1211.content: Who was the one that saw you?
1211.title: Yes

1212.content:
You breathe a sigh or relief when you make it to the nurse without being seen. You’d never hear the end of it if you had and it’s embarrassing enough your going to have to tell the nurse you had an accident.

The nurse looks up as you enter. “You poor dear! Did you have an accident?” She asks kindly but a little demeaning as though you were a little kid.

“Yeah I was in the library and I tried to hold it but-“ You trail off embarrassed.

“I see. Well we’ll fix you up and get you nice and dry soon enough.” The nurse says ushering you in further and towards a plastic lined exam bed. “Take off your wet clothes while I get you something to put on.”

You wait until she leaves the room before stripping off your soaked pants and underwear. You shiver a bit in the air conditioned room looking around to distract yourself. The nurse comes back in with something in her hands and some wipes.

“Let’s get you cleaned up yes?” She says and begins to wipe you down. You try to protest but a sharp slap to your bottom shuts you up. It didn’t really hurt and you doubt it left any kind of mark but it surprised you enough into compliance.

Finally after the nurse has wiped you down throughly she hands you some clothes to change into. Your relived to find some regular jeans but less pleased at the underwear your given.

Is it:
1212.title: No

choices: Go to counselors office (skip to results)
12121.content:
You stare at the pull-up for a full 30 seconds before you ask timidly “Couldn’t I get some regular underwear?”

“No, school policy just in case you have another accident.”

You blush. “I won’t.” You promise.

“It’s still school policy.” She says kindly. “Now can you get dressed yourself or do you need help?”

Your sure you’re as red as a fire truck. Why on earth wouldn’t you be able to dress yourself? But you hurry to put everything on just in case she changes her mind and decides to dress you herself.

The padding between your legs feels weird but your relieved to see that unless you know what to look for you couldn’t tell you were wearing a pull-up under your borrowed jeans.

“There now don’t you feel better?”

You definitely feel better now that your not in pants soaked in your own pee or half naked in the nurse’s office but you still think that you could do without the pull-up. Still you nod, overall you can’t complain about your situation too much especially since it’s kindof your own fault.

“Good. Now off to class with you and if you need a change come on by and I’ll get you a new pull-up.”

You aren’t really sure what to do with yourself since your waiting for your results and your pretty sure the librarian won’t be happy to see you. You could go to the cafeteria and get lunch or head to the counselor’s office to wait.
12121.title: A pull-up

121212.content:
Your afraid to move too much in the quite office in case you could hear the pull-up even if it might just be paranoia. You’ve waited all day for your results and hope you can go back to your normal life tomorrow.

The counselor opens her mouth and you can’t believe what you hear “You definitely don’t belong in 12th grade.”

“What do you mean?”

“You belong in:”
121212.title: Go to counselors office (skip to results)

1212121.content:
“You can’t be serious.” You say. “This is a joke. You can’t actually do that.”

“It’s not a joke.” She said firmly but not unkindly. “You just aren’t ready to be in high school regardless of your age. Not to mention I heard about your accident.” You flush at the knowledge. “In kindergarten you’ll be allowed to go to the bathroom the minute you ask and you won’t have to worry about what the other kids will say if you have another accident.”

You aren’t sure what your supposed to say. How do you respond to being told your being sent back to kindergarten. You’re supposed to be graduating this year not starting all over.

“Did you tell my mom?” You ask.

“The paperwork is being done to transfer you and should be done in time for you to attend tomorrow. Your mother was made aware of the exam but you aren’t a minor so we don’t need her permission to move you so telling her is your responsibility.”

You nod maybe if you can prove you don’t belong there you could be back in 12th before your mom or sister found out. You sure there’s been some kind of mistake and everything will be cleared up before you knew it. It would be hard to hide the fact when your mom came to pick you up and you were in the kindergarten classroom but you could probably convince her that you were in some kind of program that would look good for job interviews.

“Ok.” You say squirming a bit in your seat, it was uncomfortable and you’d been sitting there for some time now.

“Do you need to go to the bathroom?” She asked noticing your movements.

You flush and quickly shake your head. “No the chairs just uncomfortable.”

“Are you sure? We’re just about done here so why don’t you go try.”

“I don’t have to go.” You respond moodily. You weren’t a little kid and it’s not like you had a bunch of accidents before today.

She looked at you frowning a bit “Did you already have an accident and that’s why you don’t have to go?”

“No!” You say firmly.

“Why don’t you let me check to make sure. It isn’t fun to sit in a wet pull-up.” She said standing and moving over to you.

“I didn’t have an accident and I didn’t use my pull-up!” You practically yell.

“If you didn’t then you shouldn’t have a problem with me checking it.” She said calmly as she pulled you to your feet.

You try to pull away when she unbuckles your jeans and pulls them down a bit. Putting her hand on the padding between your legs she feels that they are:
1212121.title: Kindergarten

12121213.content:
She feels your pull-up and then pulls your pants back up and buttons them back up. “Dry.” She says as though what she did was no big deal and you needed to be informed about the state of your current underwear.

“I told you that.” You snap pulling away.

“There’s no need to be grumpy. Because you had an accident today you’ll be expected to wear a pull-up tomorrow as well and Mrs. Ross, your new teacher will most likely check the state of your pull-up throughout the day to make sure you stay dry.”

That was news to you. You thought that you’d be stuck wearing the pull-up today but then it’s be forgotten. “What do you mean I have to wear a pull-up tomorrow? I can see today since I don’t have any other underwear but why do I have to do it tomorrow too?” You demand.

“In kindergarten you need to have 3 dry days in a row before you can go back to big girl underwear.” She explained as though you were 5 which you supposed is where she thinks you belong. “That’s to make sure you don’t make a mess on anything in the classroom that might accidentally end up in someone’s mouth.”

That made sense for a class filled with little kids but you weren’t a 5 year old and it was only one accident. You weren’t even in the kindergarten class yet when you wet yourself. “So I can have my regular underwear back on Monday?”

“If you can stay dry and there are no more accidents then you can have your big girl underwear on Tuesday. Today doesn’t count since you had your accident today.”

You had to wear pull-ups to school for three days. It could be worse you thought at least at home you could wear regular underwear.
12121213.title: Dry

121212132.content:
The counselor met you at the school entrance today. You frowned at her but were determined to prove you were mature enough to be beyond kindergarten level work.

“Good morning Isabelle!” Mrs. Harvest said warmly. “Why don’t we get you settled in your new classroom!” She took your hand as though you needed to be led and might wander off if she didn’t. You don’t say anything, you had been hoping it was a dream or a prank or a mistake but as Mrs. Harvest stopped in front of a classroom labeled “Kindergarten A” you realized that this was really happening.

She knocked on the door before leading you inside by the hand. There was another woman inside. She was at least 6’ and towered over you which made you feel even smaller than your 4’ she had black hair that went in waves down about 2 inches past her shoulders with blue eyes.

She was:
121212132.title: The next day

1212121321.content:
“Hello Isabelle!” She said cheerily. “I heard you’ll be joining our class for at least the rest of the year.”

Your heart sank. The rest of the year? What happened when your mom wanted to know your graduation date or about prom or the senior project? What about next year would you be 19 starting 1st grade again? How would you explain that? Would you be in your 30s before you hit high school again?

Then your mind registered the words AT LEAST. Was it possible they were going to keep you in kindergarten until they believed you could move up no matter how long it took?

“Say hi to Mrs. Ross Isabelle.” Mrs Harvest prompted you after a few moments.

“Hi.” You comply. Maybe if you toed the line perfectly they would consider moving up up faster.

“Well I’m sure you can take it from here.” Mrs Harvest said letting go of your hand and moving to the door. “Before I leave Mrs. Ross, I just want to remind you to keep an eye on her. She had an accident yesterday. She should be in a pull-up just in case but you might need to remind her to go.”

“Its no problem I have a few students still in pull-ups she isn’t the only one.” Mrs Ross assured. You flushed embarrassed that Mrs Harvest would imply you couldn’t make it to the bathroom without help and that Mrs. Ross didn’t think anything of it. Didn’t she know you were actually 18?

When Mrs. Harvest finally left the room Mrs. Ross turned to you. “Let’s give you the tour alright?” She said grabbing your hand. You sighed to yourself, resigned to the fact that it was probably going to happen all the time now.

She showed you the art corner, the reading rug, the play area and then the bathroom. “Do you think you could try going for me?” She asked when you arrived in front for the bathroom door.

“I don’t have to go.” You answer but the disappointed look on her face makes you sigh and you remind yourself that you aren’t in this position because of her so you agree. For a few seconds you wait to see if she would leave or at least turn around but when she just watches you you realize you aren’t going to get any privacy. You pull down your pants and underwear and sit on the toilet

Do you go?
1212121321.title: Nice and understanding

12121213213.content:
You try your hardest but in the end you just don’t have to go. “I’m sorry.” You say at her sad look.

She smiles at you and bends down so she can look you in the eyes. “Don’t be just promise me you’ll let me know when you have to go no matter when it is alright? I’m sure you want to be in big girl panties as soon as possible right?”

As embarrassing as the conversation is you nod because it’s true. You do want to be in your regular underwear again and you only have the one pull-up that you had gotten from the nurse. You had put it back on this morning but you don’t want to wear it longer than you had to.

“Ok why don’t you go play until the rest of your classmates arrive?” Mrs Ross says taking your hand once again and bringing you to the play area before letting go.

You nod because there’s nothing else to do and sit down on the floor while Mrs. Ross goes to greet some parents that are arriving with their kids.

You aren’t sure what to play with so you look around and grab the first thing you see
12121213213.title: No

121212132133.content:
Bored, you start to build whatever comes to mind with the blocks next to you. First it’s simply a tower then you try to build a castle. Before you know it you have three towers and sections of walls in between and a small area for a door. Another kid sits down next to you and starts playing with some cars.

“Can I play with you?” The little girl asks you. You look at her and she doesn’t seem to be up to anything so you nod and share some of your blocks.

A couple hours pass as the two of you build obstacles for the cars to drive around and through before Mrs. Ross comes up behind you two and observes for a second.

“That looks really fun you two but it think you both need to take a potty break.” She says.

“But we’re having fun.” You protest.

“Yeah.” The other girl agrees.

“You can have more fun after you both go potty cause it won’t be fun if you have an accident.” Mrs Ross reminds you both gently. She takes you both by the hand and leads you to the bathroom. Then to your surprise she lifts up the other girls dress and checks her pull-up. “All dry.” She says before helping the other girl onto the toilet.

The other girl immediately starts peeing and your so distracted by the sight you don’t realize that Mrs Ross has pulled your pants down to check your own pull-up.
It’s:
121212132133.title: Blocks

1212121321331.content:
Your shocked when Mrs Ross makes the announcement and you can’t stop yourself from feeling the pull-up with your hand to check for yourself.

How did you not notice that you had wet yourself? Why didn’t you realize you had to go to the bathroom? You look at the clock as Mrs Ross leads you by the hand to a changing table by the bathroom. It’s only been 2 hours since you tried to go before.

She lifts you up onto the changing table and removes your pants the rest of the way. Then she rips the sides of the pull-up and removes that as well. She’s talking but you aren’t paying attention to her words as your still processing the fact that you’ve had 2 accidents in as many days.

You jolt to awareness when you feel a cold wipe on your privates and you squirm, trying to get away. “I know it’s cold but you need to be clean before you can be put in a new pull-up.”

The fact you need a new one causes you to start to cry a bit. “I don’t want another one.” You protest.

“You want a diaper instead?” Mrs Ross asks in surprise. “I would have thought you’d want to try one last time before I was forced to put up into a diaper.”

Quickly you shake your head. “No. I dont want a diaper and I don’t want a pull-up.” You say stubbornly.

“Well those are your choices.” Mrs Ross answers kindly. “I know you want to be a big girl but it would be irresponsible of me to let you have big girl underwear right after an accident.”

You know she’s right as much as you don’t want another pull-up you can’t say it won’t happen again though you will be more focused on making it to the bathroom. “Ok.” You pout. “I’ll wear a pull-up.”

“Good girl.” Mrs Ross praised and you feel really warm in response and manage to smile which caused her to give a bright one back. “I’m sure this will be behind you soon.”

After your finally in a new pull-up and your pants are back on it’s time for art. Everyone is quick to praise you and you offer compliments of your own. Then it’s time for lunch.

Ordinarily you would go to the cafeteria and order something that didn’t look awful. Here your all given PB&js with apple slices and a juice box. Then it’s story time.

You all sit on the rug and listen as Mrs Ross reads from one of the books on the shelf and you soon find yourself sucked into the story. Next thing you know it’s nap time.

Mrs. Ross has everyone go to the bathroom before they settle down for a nap. You notice that a few kids are pulled aside before they go and you realize she’s checking to see if they’ve had an accident. Finally it’s your turn.

Your confident that your pull-up is clean as you’ve been paying lot of attention to whether or not you had to go to the bathroom. Your not surprised when Mrs Ross pulls your pants down to check your pull-ups this time though you wish she would do it in private.

This time you’re
1212121321331.title: Wet

choices: You have a whispered talk with one of the kids
you just lay there but cant sleep
12121213213311.content:
In one way you are so relieved when Mrs. Ross anounced that youre still dry and for a short moment you even feel proud when she praised you,
but wait...why are you proud of that? Its not a big deal to not wet yourself during storytime as an 18 year old.

So the fact that you just got praised for this banality turns your pride into even more shame. Here you are, in the middle of a kindergartenbathroom around ordinary Kindergarteners with your pants down revealing underwear that is made for kids who cant be trusted to stay dry all the time.

Before Mrs. Ross turned to the next little student she orders you to use the toilet.
You have to wait a little bit before one of the little toilets was free. Another little moment of embarassment occured when you noticed that the little girl who just finished peeing now pulled up her panties - real panties, for big girls. No matter that she was not even one-third of your age but she was more trustworthy to stay dry then you.

Anyway, you had to go and this time you was able to pee in front of audience which got you another praise from Mrs. Ross which felt bittersweet.

After you had finished, The teacher told you to go to the nap room and look for a mat to settle down. She also said she will be there soon after she got everyone ready here.

While leaving the room you could see that she was now about to change a little boy into a new diaper, a real diaper not a pull up.
"At least im not on the lowest level" you think on the way to one of the mats.
You lay down and you think about the different stages of potty training the kids are here.
There are some who dont need diapers or pullups at all anymore.
Others only get it for naptime.
The next is your stage, beeing in pull ups all the time.
Finaly came those who still have to wear tape diapers, those are latebloomers but of course, they are not comparable to you in how far away you are from your peers...

Like she had promissed, a couple of minutes later, Mrs Ross and the rest of the students came into the room.
In a soft voice she announced it is naptime and wishes the class a good sleep and wonderful dreams.

She stayed there for a bit, made sure that everyone had closed their eyes and then she left the room.
12121213213311.title: Dry

choices: A short purple shirt with ruffles
12121213213313.content:
You can’t stop the tears rolling down your face. It’s one thing not to realize you wet yourself but to mess yourself and not notice?

This is your second accident today. Mrs. Ross picks you up this time and carries you to the changing table. You whimper as the mess spreads around in your pull up. You’ve really ruined your pull-up and as Mrs Ross removes your pants the rest of the way you notice you’ve ruined your pants too. They’re stained with poop and you wonder how you didn’t notice.

The rest of the kids are laying down, sleeping as Mrs Ross begins the process of wiping you down for the second time that day. “I don’t think your ready for pull-ups Isabelle.” Mrs. Ross says softly. “Maybe we should try again in a few days.” The tears come harder now. “I’ll see if I can find something for you to wear.” She taped up the diaper and then left.

You look down at the infantile garment. It’s got big bird on it and Elmo. Your in a baby diaper after having messed yourself without knowing. How long were you going to have to be in diapers?

Mrs Ross walked back over with a few choices of clothing.
12121213213313.title: Messy and wet

choices: See if a family member will take you
121212132133131.content:
Deciding that the skirt shows off the diaper and not wearing pants wasn’t an option you choose the overalls. They’re snug and you see that they bulge around the diaper a bit but at least no one can see it. Even if they do make you look like an over grown pre-schooler.

“You look so cute!” Mrs. Ross gushes and you can’t help but feel warm and pleased by the compliment.

“Thank you.” You smile, your diaper forgotten for the moment. She leads you then over to a sleeping mat and helps you lay down.

“It’s nap time now.” She whispers. Then she leaves you to rest.

You wriggle a bit, the diaper’s padding unfamiliar. Eventually you settle and fall asleep.

You wake up a little bit later when Mrs. Ross gently shakes you. When she notices you’ve woken she wastes no time in checking your diaper. For the first time today your dry when she checks. She clips the overalls back up and sends you off to play for the rest of the day.

As the school day ends parents come to pick up their children and you realize you’ll have to explain to your mom why you are dressed like a 4 year old except for your underwear which belongs to a 2 year old.

You squirm watching the other parents and jump when you feel something warm spread around your privates. It takes you a few minutes to realize you’ve just wet yourself. Blushing you head to Mrs. Ross for a change.

She’s happy you noticed your accident and picks you up like a toddler to go change your diaper. You try to act like it’s nothing but her praise at your accomplishment makes you happy.

When your finally changed and the overalls are buckled back up your placed back on your feet. “Thank you.” You tell her. You may not want to wear diapers but it’s clear your might need them and she has changed you three times today.

“Anytime little one.” She replies ruffling your hair a bit.

“I’ll see you tomorrow.”

“I can’t let you leave without a grown up.” Mrs Ross says apologetically. “Your mommy called the school. She has to go on a business trip.”

Your briefly disoriented by the use of the word mommy. You haven’t called your mom that since your sister was born. Then you hear the rest of what was being said. “If she’s leaving and I can’t go without an adult then what am I going to do?” You ask.

“You have three options.” Mrs Ross answered. “You can stay with me while your mommy is gone, I can drop you off at a 24/7 daycare where you can stay until she gets back, or I can call a family member to come and get you and you can stay with them.”
121212132133131.title: Pink overalls with lace

1212121321331311.content:
You decide you want to stay with Mrs. Ross. If you stay at a daycare you’ll have to explain why you were there. Calling relatives wasn’t an option. While your aunt may agree to take you in you would never hear the end of it that you were just a baby at 18 years old.

“Can I really stay with you?” You ask.

“Of course I wouldn’t have offered if I wasn’t serious.” Mrs. Ross assures. “Your mommy also said that your sister is staying with a friend until she gets back.”

Your relieved you don’t have to explain anything to your sister who would be sure to make your life hell if she found out. She already makes fun of you for being so small and she’s a good foot taller despite being 5 years younger.

Mrs. Ross drafts you into helping clean up the classroom before you both leave. She’s holding your hand again and you find yourself getting used to it. Finally your in the parking lot and getting into the back of her car. Before you can move she’s buckling you in and closing the door.

When she gets into the divers seat she rummages around looking for something. She pulls out a cd, pops it into the player and out comes kiddie music.

You want to groan but stay silent she’s doing you a favor by letting you stay with her.
1212121321331311.title: Stay with Mrs. Ross

12121213213313112.content:
Your shocked and dismayed to discover your not going straight to your teachers house. Instead your pulling up to an outlet strip mall. It’s not the kind of place people your age would willingly go so at least you aren’t likely to be recognized. Most teens would go to the bigger mall where they sold the name brand clothes.

“We just have to pick up a few things before we head home.” Mrs. Ross said cheerfully as though taking an 18 year old dressed as a toddler out shopping was completely normal.

“Can’t I just wait in the car?” You ask shyly. Even if you weren’t going to run the risk of running into someone you knew you still didn’t want to be seen in your current outfit.

“That would be too dangerous.” She said with a shake of her head as she got out of the car. She made her way around and opened your door before unbuckling you. “Come on. It won’t take long.” She took your hand and pulled you from the car.

She led you into the mall as you passed person after person nervously.
12121213213313112.title: You stop at the store

121212132133131122.content:
Your amazed to see that not a single person looks at you funny. Sure they see you but everyone acts like it’s completely normal. Slowly you relax and pay more attention to where Mrs. Ross is taking you.

Your first stop is a clothing store. You wonder what it is your doing here but as the two of you head to the kids section you start to understand. Your here to get clothes for you and Mrs. Ross wants to get you kids clothes.

At first you protest that the clothes won’t fit but it doesn’t last long because you find out that they do fit you. Some of them better than your actual clothes do. Your even embarrassed to discover that it’s not even the largest size in kids.

After Mrs. Ross picks out a few outfits and has you try on a couple more your finally ready to check out and your feeling very tired. Your sluggish as your teacher tugs to towards another store and you realize Mrs. Ross has only let go of your hand when you were trying outfits on.

The next store is a bit weird you think. Instead of walking around Mrs. Ross leads you to one of the assistants in the shop. Your rubbing your eyes and don’t pay much attention to what it is the two of them are saying.

Next thing you know your overalls are being dropped in the middle of the store with your diaper on display for anyone to see. It snaps you awake as you realize that everyone can see your diaper and in fact the assistant Mrs. Ross has been talking to was looking at it intently.

You move to pull the overalls back up but are stopped by Mrs. Ross. You look at her, tears in your eyes, and wonder how she could be so cruel but you don’t see malice on her face or in her eyes only kindness and compassion.

“Why?” You whine wanting to tug your clothes back on before other people can see you.

“He needs to see how your diaper fits to get you a proper size.” Mrs. Ross explains patiently.

You flush, taking a proper look around the store for the first time. Your in a diaper store. Your in a diaper store with someone who wants to buy diapers for you.

The cold air makes you shiver and you are powerless to stop yourself from using your diaper.
121212132133131122.title: They don’t look twice

1212121321331311223.content:
You want to die as you mess yourself in front of a compete stranger. Then as though your humiliation wasn’t complete your bladder gives way as well.

Now your standing with your diaper on full display showing off just how much of a baby you were. You burst into tears as the situation sinks in and your stomach cramps up again and releases another load into the already full diaper.

There is no way you can claim to be 18, an adult when you can’t even stop yourself from using your diaper like a baby. Maybe you should just give up on keeping your situation a secret and resign yourself to the fact that you are where you belong.

Your oblivious to the fact that Mrs. Ross has picked you up and carried you to the back towards the changing tables, your overalls forgotten. She carries you into a family bathroom but puts you on a little bench and untapped your diaper.

Your mostly clean when you can calm yourself enough to realize the assistant is standing there with a package in his hands that he’s handing to Mrs. Ross. When he sees you looking at him he smiles kindly “almost better.” He coos.

You should find the situation mortifying but the words and tone help settle you down the rest of the way to notice that the package he had handed to Mrs. Ross was a package of diapers.

They were different than the ones you had been wearing earlier. As she finished taping up the diaper you noticed it was much thicker and instead of Sesame Street characters it had teddy bears in diapers with a blue strip down the middle. As you were sat up you also realized it was louder too. Every movement caused the diaper to crinkle loudly letting everyone know it was there.

Mrs. Ross seemed happy with them though and you weren’t in a position to complain. You continued to inspect your new diaper while Mrs. Ross and the assistant spoke. Finally it seemed like they were done.

When Mrs. Ross stood from her seat on the couch you automatically grabbed her hand and stood as well, diaper crinkling the entire time. You didn’t want to leave the bathroom without pants on but seeing as you had just messed your diaper in front of everyone it couldn’t get any worse.

They went back to where your overalls had been left and Mrs. Ross helped you back into them. You had a hard time balancing on your own because of the bulk of the diaper and the overalls ballooned out where the diaper was making it obvious to anyone looking at you.

They headed to the register where Mrs Ross payed and received many bags. You wondered how many diapers she had bought. Then they left the mall.

When they returned to the car in the backseat there was:
1212121321331311223.title: Both

12121213213313112232.content:
You flush. You can’t believe there’s a carseat in the back. As Mrs. Ross opens the door and picks you up to put you in your fears are made real. Your buckled into the car seat and the door is closed. Mrs. Ross puts all the bags into the trunk and then gets into the drivers seat all while you sit there in shock.

How can you even fit in a car seat? Your feet don’t touch the ground and the padding around the headrest keeps you from really being able to look around not to mention the straps make it hard to move. The buckle at your crotch pushes the diaper into you making you hyper aware of it.

You whine wanting out. You do not like your car seat at all as you wriggle about. It’s after about 15 minutes that you realize you probably look like a disgruntled toddler who doesn’t want to be in a car seat.

“I want out.” You huff to Mrs. Ross as you continue to wiggle.

“Your too small to be without a car seat. If we were in an accident you’d get very hurt.” Mrs. Ross explains.

That stops you for a minute. Your too small? Was that why your mom never let you learn how to drive or sit in the front seat? You were too short? Those thoughts occupy you until your pulling up to a nice house and Mrs. Ross parks.

Your frustrated when she gets the bags in the trunk first and brings them inside before coming back for you. This time she carries you like a toddler into the house.

“Do you want to watch a movie while I put the things away?” Your teacher coos. You think a movie sounds nice after everything and nod. She settles you on the couch and sets up the DVD player.

Eventually you realize your watching Winnie the Pooh but you don’t mind. You continue to watch until Mrs. Ross is done putting the things away and the movie ends.

“Alright let’s give you a bath and then my husband should be home and it’ll be time for dinner.” Mrs. Ross said as she picked you up and carried you upstairs.

You think you probably should have seen the warning signs about what would happen but it still catches you off guard when she starts running the bath and starts undressing you.

“I can give myself a bath.” You say. You would prefer a shower but a bath is nice too.

Mrs. Ross ignores the statement as she adds bubbles to the water. Soon enough the bath is filled and your diaper is damp. You think it had something to do with being mostly naked in the bathroom but you couldn’t help wetting yourself a little.

She shuts off the water and puts you in the tub. Along with some bath toys. She lets you play for a little bit before starting to clean you. You try to wriggle away but it’s maternal instead of sexual and you find yourself giving in.

She pays extra attention to your privates and when you ask why she say it’s because that needs to be cleaned because you are wearing a diaper and you’ll get a rash is your not careful.

She washes your hair as your body begins to tingle and she uses the shower head to rise the shampoo out. Then she tell you to stand as she starts to drain the tub and rises you down completely.

That’s when you notice:
12121213213313112232.title: A carseat

121212132133131122322.content:
The hair on your arms is gone the hair as well as the hair on your legs which would be fine except you can’t stop staring at your womanhood which shows no sign of ever having had hair. It’s completely hairless not even stubble left.

Your shocked and dismayed. Looking at yourself in the bathroom mirror you see a child. Your breasts had never really grown and so you were flat chested. Your arms and legs as well as your face had never lost it’s baby fat and now the only proof you had gone through puberty was gone.

Mrs. Ross had dried you off while you stared at your reflection. Now she carried you to a room.

“This is going to be your room while you stay here.” Mrs. Ross said cheerfully.

It was a:
121212132133131122322.title: Your body is hairless

1212121321331311223222.content:
The room was decorated as a toddler’s bedroom. It had a changing table a diaper pail a toy chest and a twin bed with paw patrol sheets and rails on the side that could be raised or lowered.

You were overwhelmed as she placed you on the changing table. Taking out one of your new diapers she placed it under you and then put oil on you and rubbed it in before doing the same with baby powder and then taping the diaper up. Then while you were lying there she grabbed something from the dresser in the room and came back.

She had:
1212121321331311223222.title: Little girls room

choices: Give in and suck your thumb
12121213213313112232222.content:
She had a pale yellow frilly dress that poofed out at the bottom and a frilly diaper cover to match. She slipped it over your head and buttoned up the back and then slipped the diaper cover on over your diapers then she put laced socks on your feet and finished with Mary Janes. Then sitting you up she did your hair into two pigtails while you were in shock. She stepped back taking a look at you before shaking her head.

She left but returned quickly before you could think about escaping and took the pigtails out she brushed your hair and to your shock cut your hair.

Then she placed your hair back into the pigtails and looked at you. She smiled. “You look absolutely precious!” She exclaimed. “Just wait till my husband sees you!”

The statement caused you to focus but Mrs. Ross was already picking you up and placing you in front of a mirror shocking you once more.

In front of you stood a little girl with brown hair in pigtails and bangs in a pale yellow dress that stopped at the top of the diaper and a diaper cover the same color with ruffles on the butt, lacey white crew socks and white Mary Janes.

You couldn’t even recognize yourself and you had to fight the urge to suck your thumb as you continued to stare at the little girl who couldn’t have been more than 3 or 4 years old
12121213213313112232222.title: A yellow frilly dress

121212132133131122322222.content:
You fight off the urge and turn away from the mirror angrily. “Why are you doing this?” You demand.

Your teacher doesn’t seem upset by the outburst but she does seem a little worried. “My husband will be home soon. I know your not really a little girl but my husband may have a little trouble understanding why an 18 year old is in kindergarten or wearing diapers. I’m not trying to humiliate you. You look exactly like a little girl so there won’t be a question as to why you need to stay with me while your mommy is gone or why you need diapers. Your hair will start to grow back by the time you need to go home so no one needs to know the truth.” She says. “If you’d like to leave and go to a relatives or the daycare after this I understand and I’ll take you.”
121212132133131122322222.title: Don’t

1212121321331311223222221.content:
You guess you could act like a little kid while your staying with Mrs. Ross. Your already in kindergarten and you haven’t exactly been acting like an adult all day.

“Ok I’ll stay but no more surprises.” You decide.

She smiles. “No more.” She assures. “You’ve had a lot of changes in a short time, I’ll make sure you get some warning if anything else has to be done but I believe I got everything covered.”

You turn back to the mirror and look at yourself. Your image still shocks you even though you know what you’ll find. Mrs. Ross goes to clean up everything while you continue to examine the stranger in front of you.

The sound of a door opening and closing downstairs causes you to jump, startled. A male voice rings out. “Liv?”

Mrs. Ross rubs your back comfortingly as she respondes. “Up here Ron.”

You hear footsteps up the stairs and your shaking a bit when you realize that someone is about to see you dressed like this. The urge to put your thumb in your mouth for comfort resurfaces but you ignore it.

A man in a suit walks in. He’s just as tall as Mrs. Ross if not a little taller. He has short blond hair and looks to be well built even in a business suit. “What are you doing in here?” He asks before he catches sight of you. “Who’s this?”

“This is Isabelle. She’s one of my students. Her mom had to go away on business so I volunteered to take care of her until she came back.” Mrs. Ross told him. “Isn’t she the most adorable 5 year old ever?”

Does he believe her?
1212121321331311223222221.title: Believe her (stay)

12121213213313112232222211.content:
He smiles at you. “She certainly is.” He agrees. He moves closer and you back into Mrs. Ross a bit in response but he doesn’t seem bothered by it. He kneels in front of you and sticks out his hand. “I’m Mrs. Ross’s husband Ron. It’s nice to meet you.” He says kindly.

Your a little unsure but reach out an shake his hand anyway. Your small hand seems to completely disappear in his much larger one. “Hi.” You say softly.


When he releases your hand he stands and addresses Mrs. Ross. “I brought dinner. I figured pizza would be okay.”

“Sounds wonderful.” Mrs. Ross agreed. She took your hand and you all made your way downstairs. You had a little trouble with the thickness of your diaper but holding Mrs. Ross’s hand you were able to make it down the steps.

Your sat into a regular chair as Mr. Ross gets you a plate. He sets it out of your reach and then pulls something out of a drawer in the attached kitchen.

“Let’s make sure nothing gets on that pretty dress.” He says. Then he puts whatever he grabbed around your neck and you look down seeing a bib. He places your plate in front of you and then grabs his own.

You aren’t sure how you feel about the bib but you reason that it’s not really a big deal and begin to eat. As you eat you learn a lot about Mr. and Mrs. Ross.

Mr. Ross is the CEO of some large company which is how they can afford such a nice house. You also know that he works out every morning for an hour before leaving for work.

As the conversation flows around you you begin to feel like the little kid your pretending to be. There’s no pressure to contribute to the conversation in any meaningful way like there would be if you were acting your age. Mr. and Mrs. Ross are so tall you feel very small sitting with them. Walking around everyday you had always felt short since most adults were at least a foot or taller than you but you feel especially dwarfed between the two Amazon.

You wonder if that’s why no one looked twice at you in the store. Standing next to someone that tall dressed like a toddler everyone probably assumed you were just a tall child out with your mommy who was extremely tall herself.

“So what do you like to do?” Mr. Ross asked you suddenly.

You hesitate answering. You can’t tell him you like shopping and reading magazines or playing video games. It would be a give away that you weren’t actually 5. Instead you say “I like movies and coloring and building things.”

Mr. Ross smiles and takes on a look of mock surprise. “Building things?! You mean like buildings? Did you build mine?”

You know it’s ridiculous and that he knows it too but you can’t help but giggle at the question. “No! With blocks.” You say.

“Oh! With blocks!” He says as though he only just understood. You decide you like Mr. Ross he’s funny. “You know I think there are some blocks in the toy box in your room.” He says in a stage whisper as though sharing a secret.

“Really?” You ask, curious. Building blocks had kept you entertained for most of the day and you supposed you weren’t against playing with them some more especially when you didn’t have to share.

“Yep.” He confirmed. He got up and removed the bib from around your neck. “Why don’t you go have a look while we clean up dinner?”

You nod and head for the stairs. Mrs. Ross calls after you to be careful on the steps. You take it to heart. You aren’t as sure on your feet as you usually are and it’s probably because you aren’t used to the bulk of the diaper yet. You make sure to hold onto the railing as you climb and feel a sense of pride when you make it up without incident.

As you walk towards your room you notice that your developing a baby’s waddle from having your legs forced apart by the padding. You try to correct it and walk normally but it’s uncomfortable and borders on painful so you give up. You guess you’ll just have to deal with it.

You finally make it over to the toy box and open it. Taking a look at all the toys your a little overwhelmed. You start by taking all the toys out and examining them. You get distracted by a teddy bear for a little bit and keep it close as you continue looking and stumble across a train set. Before you know it your completely absorbed in playing with the trains and your new friend.

You don’t notice the hours pass or the fact that you’ve actually started talking to the bear like it can answer back. Your distracted by your stomach cramping but you don’t want to stop playing and soon enough it’s forgotten. The cramps hit a second time more forcefully.

Before you can register what your doing your shifting your position and pushing a load into your diaper. When you finish you realize what you just did. You just willingly messed your diaper. It wasn’t an accident because you knew you had to go and ignored it so you could play.

Now you can either sit in your mess or go tell Mrs. Ross that you need a change. You could pass it off as another accident and she wouldn’t have to know but then you’d have to stop playing.

Do you:
12121213213313112232222211.title: Yes

choices: Long sleeve shirt and pants with stars on them
121212132133131122322222112.content:
You really don’t want to stop having fun yet. You decide you’ll play for a little bit longer before asking for a change. You try not to sit in your mess and spread it around but soon that goal is forgotten amidst your fun.

You completely forget about the state of your diaper and are surprised when you notice Mrs. Ross standing in the doorway. When she sees that you’ve seen her she smiles. “Just about time for bed little one.” She says moving towards you. Her keen nose picks up the state of your diaper though you’ve completely forgotten about it. “I think it’s also time for a change.”

You flush as you finally remember what’s in your diaper and the fact that your currently sitting in it. “I forgot.” You admit.

Mrs. Ross doesn’t stop smiling as she picks you up. “That’s alright. I’ll just make sure to keep a closer eye on you to make sure you aren’t in a wet or messy diaper for too long.”

She makes quick work of changing you into a new diaper and then into some pjs which are:
121212132133131122322222112.title: Keep playing

1212121321331311223222221121.content:
It’s warm and soft on your skin. She places you back on your feet. “Why don’t you go clean up your toys and then it’s time for bed.” You nod and toddle over to the toys you pulled out and start putting them away. You leave the bear for last and as you move to put him away Mrs. Ross says “Why don’t you leave your friend out, you can lay in bed with him.”

You hesitate but in the end decide to keep him with you as you head over to Mrs. Ross. She takes your hand and leads you over to the bathroom. It feels strange being in there. Everything is designed for someone much taller than you so you can’t even reach the sink very well. She sits you on top of the toilet and gets a toothbrush prepared for you.

You blush realizing that this is the most you’ve used a toilet all day and your basically using it as a chair.

You brush your teeth quickly with some help reaching the sink and then it’s back to your room and into the bed.

“Do you want a story?” She asks as she pulls the covers up and tucks you in.
1212121321331311223222221121.title: Footie pjs

12121213213313112232222211211.content:
You nod. You remember how nice it was to listen to Mrs. Ross read. As she went to go pick out a book her husband walked in. In his hand he had a sippy cup. It confused you because you had a regular cup at dinner.

He must have seen your confusion because he said “just in case you get thirsty during the night. We don’t want any spills.”

It made sense to you. He put the sippy cup on the bedside table, said goodnight, and then left the room as his wife settled next to you on the bed to read. You were asleep after only a couple pages.

You woke halfway in the middle of the night wondering what it was so you could go back to sleep. Your eyes caught on the sippy cup and without a second thought slipped it into your mouth. As you drifted off you thought about how nice it was not to have to get up in the middle of the night.

The next time you woke it was morning and you could see the empty sippy cup laying next to you on the bed. You don’t remember waking up and drinking it but you guess you had at some point. As you sit up you realize that isn’t the only thing to happen during the night.

What happened?
12121213213313112232222211211.title: Yeah why not

choices: A t-shirt with a kitten on it and bedazzled jeans
A dress that said “I’m a princess but I can save myself”
A blue shirt and jean overalls
121212132133131122322222112112.content:
You shouldn’t be surprised. You can’t even keep yourself dry while your awake. Still the fact that you can now classify yourself as a bedwetter is humiliating. As your diaper squishes beneath you your relieved that it doesn’t look like the bed is wet at all.

You turn to get up and realize that the rails had been raised at some point. You don’t have to wait to see if you can figure out how to lower them because Mrs. Ross comes in.

“Good morning!” She says cheerfully. “Did you have a good nights sleep?”

“Yeah.” You answer eager to get out of your kiddie prison.

She picks you up and carries you to the changing table. She makes quick work of cleaning you up and putting you in a new diaper. When she moves towards the dresser you have a flashback to yesterday when you ended up in the yellow dress.

This time she brings over:
121212132133131122322222112112.title: Your wet

1212121321331311223222221121121.content:
It’s one of the outfits you bought yesterday. Childish but compared to the outfit last night it might as well be your regular clothes. You try to tell Mrs. Ross that you can dress yourself but you find she’s a lot quicker at dressing you than you are.

She carries you down the steps and into the dining room. Sitting you at the table she leaves to go get your breakfast. She brings back some eggs and toast. “You should have time for some cartoons before we have to go.”

Watching tv sounds appealing even if it would be kid shows. You finish quickly and head off to the living room and turn the tv on. Mrs. Ross follows you and with her eyes watching you don’t dare pick anything other than something meant for kids. Your pleasantly surprised to find The Wild Thornberries is on and sit down to watch.

Before you know it it’s time for you to leave. Mrs. Ross buckles you into the dreaded car seat but this time she hands you the teddy bear you had last night before closing the door. Was she trying to distract you from trying to wriggle free?

Does it work?
1212121321331311223222221121121.title: A t-shirt with a kitten on it and bedazzled jeans

12121213213313112232222211211211.content:
As much as you don’t want to be distracted by your new friend you can’t help but focus on him. Before you know it your talking to him and he’s answering you back and the two of you are in a spaceship exploring the vastness of space.

Mrs. Ross brings you back to earth when she opens your door. “Alright little astronaut time to come back to earth.” She unbuckles you and you take her hand as you both head into the school.

Your a little embarrassed that you were acting like a little kid in the car and try to summon at least some of your maturity now. None the students have started to arrive yet but there are plenty of teachers around getting ready for their classes.

Do any of them stop to talk to you or Mrs. Ross?
12121213213313112232222211211211.title: Yes

121212132133131122322222112112111.content:
Who?

Mr. Shay he teaches math. He is nice enough if a bit clueless

Mr. Finn he teaches PE can be a bit mean if you goof off but as long as he sees you trying your best he’s pretty laid back

Miss. Middle she was your English teacher and made your life hell. No answer you have was ever right and would love to humiliate you if she had the chance
121212132133131122322222112112111.title: Yes

1212121321331311223222221121121113.content:
Miss Middle walked up to you and Mrs. Ross. Your filled with dread and move closer to Mrs. Ross hoping to hide and remain unnoticed by your tormentor.

Mrs. Ross squeezed your hand and rubbed your back trying to calm you even though she didn’t understand what exactly was wrong.

The two of them spoke for a minute before Miss. Middle looked down at you.

Does she recognize you?
1212121321331311223222221121121113.title: Miss Middle

121212132133131122322222112112111311.content:
She smirks down at you and you can see the exact moment she realizes your in a diaper because it turns into an evil grin. “Hello Isabelle.” She said in a sickly sweet voice. “I heard one of the seniors had been sent back to kindergarten. I didn’t realize it was you. I’m not surprised though, it was clear you didn’t belong in my class.”

“Donna.” Mrs. Ross warned.

“Relax Olivia. I’m not telling her anything she doesn’t already know.” Miss. Middle said haughtily. “I mean if she can’t even pass potty training she obviously doesn’t belong in high school.”

“That’s enough. I’m going to make sure to mention this the the principal.” Mrs Ross said furiously. She pulled you along as she headed to the classroom.

You couldn’t stop the tears rolling down your face. Though cruel, Miss Middle was right. You weren’t even convinced you belonged in kindergarten at this point.

When you arrived inside the classroom Mrs. Ross looked down at you and saw your tears. “Oh dear.” She cooed picking you up. “Don’t listen to her. She’s just being mean for the sake of it.” She rocked you gently in her arms as you sobbed and continued to coo nonsense to you.

You felt like a baby. How could you claim you were ready for school at all? You couldn’t keep your pants dry. You couldn’t calm yourself down, you needed the help of someone else. Slowly though, you were calming down. Mrs Ross clearly knew what she was doing because between the rocking and her words your tears were slowing and your sobs less frequent.

She was holding you like a toddler and you laid your head down on her shoulder, tired from your outburst. You felt your diaper grow warm and you couldn’t find it in yourself to get upset about it. Instead you felt the urge for the third time to suck your thumb.
121212132133131122322222112112111311.title: Yes

1212121321331311223222221121121113111.content:
This time you don’t fight it and slip your thumb into your mouth. You give it a couple of sucks and relax finding the sensation soothing. Your finally calm if tired.

Mrs. Ross looks down at you and gives your bottom a few pats. “Let’s get you changed.” She says heading to the changing table. You realize she must have felt you wet yourself when your diaper got warm not to mention when she felt your bottom but you don’t care. This isn’t the first time she’s changed you.

She lays you down and you whine in protest. You don’t want to be put down right now. “I know little one but you can’t stay in a wet diaper.” She coos.

You continue to suck your thumb as you watch Mrs Ross rummage around in a large bag. You realize when she pulls out one of your diapers that it’s a diaper bag for you. You aren’t sure how you feel about that right now.

She’s efficient like always and before you know it your back in her arms. You nuzzle your face into her neck as your mouth works rhythmically on your thumb feeling safe and warm and most of all very very little.

You remain in her arms as she sets everything up and begins to greet the other students and parents. Your not sleeping but your content exactly where you are and every now and then she pats your bottom or rubs your back.

Your not feeling as clingy by the time the last student arrives and you wriggle to be put down. She sets you down easily and pats your bottom. “Go play for a bit.” She says to you and you go do exactly that.

You play with a couple of your classmates but mostly by yourself having left your furry friend in the car. The day goes about the same as yesterday but Mrs. Ross doesn’t bother to try to take you to the bathroom instead she just checks the state of your diaper. By the time school is over you needed four changes but at least your clothes stayed clean.

You help clean up just before the parents start to arrive to pick up their kids and finish by the time the third kid leaves. Now your a little bored though and Mrs. Ross was talking to a parent about the progress their kid was making already. You aren’t sure what to do with yourself and kind of want Mrs. Ross’s attention.
1212121321331311223222221121121113111.title: Give in

12121213213313112232222211211211131113.content:
You make your way over to the two adults and stand in front of Mrs. Ross. You tug gently on the bottom of her shirt and when she looks down you lift your arms in the universal way that’s says “I want up.”

She doesn’t stop talking with the parent as she lifts you into her arms and you lay your head back on her shoulder and put your thumb in your mouth which has been happening on and off all day. The parent says something about you to the teacher but you aren’t really interested in the grownup conversation and your kind of drifting in and out.

“Are you a sleepy little one?” Mrs. Ross asks after she bids the parent and student goodbye. You nod.

“Sleepy.” You agree.

“Why don’t you take a little nap then?” She says patting you behind and it’s like magic. With every pat your eyes get heavier and heavier until you can’t open them anymore and you fall asleep in her arms.

When you wake your back home on the couch. You rub your eyes and sit up. Your diaper is wet you realize so you slide off the couch and look for Mrs. Ross.

She’s in the kitchen when you find her. The crinkling of the diaper in the quiet house must give you away because she turns around as you come into the room. “Did you have a good nap?” She asks.

“Uh huh.” You say. You may have wanted a change when you woke up but now you just want to be picked back up. You toddle over to her and lift your arms again. She obliged but when she patted your diapered butt she headed towards the steps.

“A quick change little one.” She says.

“Ok.” You agree. You aren’t bothered by the state of your diaper anymore. You needed them so it was natural that they would be wet or messy or even both. You’ve accepted that. Mrs. Ross took care of changing you it was the way things were.

Your world that had consisted of so many things now only consisted of Mrs Ross and her husband in their house and the kindergarten classroom. Your day was decided for you and you didn’t even have to worry about going to the bathroom because that was what your diapers were for.

While you were laying down waiting to be changed Mrs. Ross handed you your furry friend and you were happy to see him. Mrs Ross changed you as you told your friend all about your day.

“What would you like to do now?” Mrs Ross asked picking you back up.
12121213213313112232222211211211131113.title: Ask to be picked up

choices: Play with something from the toy box
121212132133131122322222112112111311131.content:
You weren’t really in the mood for a movie right now and you didn’t want to be alone in your room. Really what you wanted was to be close to Mrs. Ross and if she was going to be in the kitchen then you could color in the dining room and still be close by.

She set you up with some crayons and markers and a couple of coloring books. You set to work on a cars themed one and thought about the past two days.

You wondered why Mrs. Ross had a toddler room set up but didn’t have any kids. You also wondered why since she was great with them. She had done more for you than you could remember your mother ever doing.

Your mom wasn’t mean or anything. It’s just she felt that things like bedtime stories or teddy bears coddled children too much. You’d been allowed your teddy bear until you were 3 and then she had taken it away along with your sippy cups and anything she thought might make you too soft. That was also around the time you had stopped calling her mommy and just called her mom. You can’t remember her ever reading to you for bed or otherwise.

Your dad hadn’t felt the same but worked too often to really make a difference. He had been the one to offer cuddles and to read to you. Sometimes he even snuck you your teddy in the night after he got home.

It was different here. Mrs. Ross was always dotting on you no matter what else she was doing. She hadn’t minded cuddling you today after your breakdown or even when you had simply wanted to be held after school. She didn’t get mad about your accidents or that she had to change your diapers. She didn’t yell at you or seemed upset in anyway when you were sucking your thumb.

The behaviors that your mom had always had a problem with and berated you for were accepted as natural here and you decided you were looking forward to the time spent here while your mom was gone.

“You look hard at work!” Said a male voice you recognized as belonging to Mr Ross.

You looked up at him and smiled. “Uh huh.” You agreed. “I try really hard.”

“I bet.” He said ruffling your hair with a smile. “Do you think I could have a look?”

You look down at the picture you’ve been coloring. You weren’t really focused when you were doing it and it looks like a 4 year old colored it because you scribbled a bit outside the lines. Still your supposed to be 5 so you guess it’s alright. You nod and hand it to him.

He looks at it and says “I think this masterpiece belongs on the fridge! What do you think?”

Your a little embarrassed that anyone would be able to see your horrible coloring job but excitement fills you at the idea so you nod vigorously bouncing a little in your seat.

Mr. Ross places the picture front and center on the refrigerator and a sense of pride washes over you seeing it and you grin widely. You get off the chair and rush over to Mrs Ross tugging on her hand gently.

“Do you see? My picture is on the ‘figerator!” You tell her excitedly.

She laughs good naturedly. “Yes little one I see it. Its very good. Now why don’t the two of you run along while I finish dinner.”

“Sure Liv.”’ Mr. Ross says from behind you before he scoops you up into his arms. You squeal in surprise.

He brings you upstairs into a large bedroom you’ve never seen before and you realize it’s the master bedroom. “You stay right there while I get out of this monkey suit.” He tells you putting you down on the bed.

“You don’t look like a monkey.” You say before you can stop yourself. But he just laughs.

“It’s just a saying kiddo.”

“Oh.” You say feeling silly.

He goes into a walk-in closet and disappears from sight. You look around from your position on the bed and wish teddy was there with you so you could explore together. Before you can get too bored however Mr Ross comes back out in some sweats looking more relaxed.

“Alright kiddo what should we do while we wait for dinner?” He asks you.
121212132133131122322222112112111311131.title: Color

1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.content:
“Movie?” You suggest.

“Sounds like a plan!” He agrees picking you back up. He pats your bottom and you aren’t sure how you feel about him doing that.

It’s not like he doesn’t know your wearing a diaper but Mrs Ross has been doing it a lot lately to check the state of you diaper and you wonder if that’s what he’s doing.

“First thing we need to do is get you into a clean diaper.” He says and you bury your face into his neck in embarrassment. He chuckles. “It’s alright. Your just not ready to be a big girl yet and that’s fine. Don’t rush it.”

You know that he doesn’t know your actually 18 but still it stings a bit even if that’s not how he meant it. He has no idea how right he is about you not being ready to be a ‘big girl’. Three days ago you had no trouble making it to the bathroom and now it’s been 2 days since you’ve actually used a toilet like the 18 year old you should be.

He puts you down on the changing table and all of a sudden it’s clear that he means to change your diaper. You whine and slip your thumb into your mouth as your laidback and your pants are pulled down and you kick your legs a little in displeasure.

To your surprise he is just as quick and efficient at changing you as Mrs Ross is and before you know it your pants are back on and your back in his arms as he carries you down the steps.

“Teddy?” You ask as he heads towards the living room.

“Sure do you remember where he is?”

You nod, thumb still in your mouth, and point towards the dining room where teddy had sat with you while you colored. He turns around and heads to the dining room instead and your friend is right there on the table waiting for you. You reach out from your position on Mr. Ross’s hip and grab teddy pulling him close.

“We have everything?” He asks you.

You nod. “Movie now.” You agree.

You were hoping for something a bit more mature with Mr. Ross but he puts in 101 Dalmatians. Before you know it your cuddled into Mr. Ross’s side, teddy wrapped in your arms, thumb in mouth, and completely engrossed in the movie.

After the movie is dinner. Mr. Ross puts another bib on you but you don’t pay it much mind especially since you end up needing it when you spill some of your drink down your shirt.

Once dinner is over and everything is cleaned up Mrs. Ross says it’s time for your bath and then pjs. You look at the time and see it’s only 6:30.

She picks you up and carries you to the bathroom you were in this morning and starts to run a bath. “I don’t wanna go to bed yet.” You say.

“By the time your done with your bath and get dressed it’ll be almost 8 because it’s a weekend I think you can stay up for one show but then it’s bedtime.” She says firmly.

“But that would only be 8:30!” You whine.

“And 30 minutes past your bedtime during the week.” She says unwaveringly. “If you prove that your too tired to stay awake by fussing though you’ll go to bed on time at 8 instead.”

The warning clear you stop arguing. Mrs. Ross turns out to be right though. By the time your ready for bed it’s 8. She carries you down and your allowed to watch one episode of paw patrol before your wisked off to bed.

Your diaper is checked one last time and then your tucked in and Mrs. Ross is picking up the book she had started to read to you last night. Mr. Ross brought in another sippy cup for the night and he said his goodnights.

For the second night in a row you drift off after only a couple pages.
1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.title: Movie

1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.content:
You think your run in with Miss Middle shook you more than you realized because you wake up drenched in sweat from a nightmare staring her. Your sobbing and tears are pouring down your face in rivers.

You must have been making a lot of noise too because suddenly the light is on and your being pulled into Mrs. Ross’s arms. “Mama!” You cry holding onto her tightly.

She hushes you gently as she tries to calm you for the second time today. It takes a little bit but eventually your calm and shivering from your cold wet clothes. You don’t even realize when you begin to whine in discomfort.

You hear a mans voice murmur something and your understand that Mr and Mrs Ross were having a conversation. Your changed into a new diaper and new pjs but you aren’t put back into bed right away instead Mrs. Ross craddles you like a baby as she sits in a rocking chair in the room.

Mr. Ross returns with a bottle of what you learn to be warm milk and gives it to his wife before kissing your forehead and leaving the room.

Mrs Ross manages to get the nipple of the bottle into your mouth and you begin to suckle. When the bottle is finished your barely awake as she tucks you back into bed. “Mama.” You murmur again as you drift off and the railing was raised again.

The next morning you
1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.title: You have a nightmare

1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.content:
Your feeling really good when you wake up the next morning. You don’t remember your nightmare or the breakdown following it. All you remember is falling asleep to Mrs. Ross’s voice.

You lay there for a moment, cuddling Teddy. At some point your thumb makes it into your mouth but eventually you reach for the sippy cup instead to quench your thirst.

That’s how Mrs. Ross finds you a few minutes later. “Good morning little one.” She says.

“Morning” you echo her around the sippy cup.

She smiles and lift you up. After a quick diaper change she brings you and Teddy downstairs for breakfast. Today Mr. Ross is down there too.

“Morning kiddo.” He says brightly.

“Morning.” You cheerfully reply. Your a bit more awake after your change. Your set into what’s becoming your chair at the table.

“What should we do today?” He asks you while Mrs. Ross gets your plate. “We could go to the park, go on a picnic, or maybe go skating.”
1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.title: Don’t remember what happened

1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.content:
You haven’t been to the park in years. Not since you were little. The days were going to start getting colder soon and you haven’t been outside to play like your classmates in an attempt to keep anyone who might recognize you from seeing you. The idea of playing in the park seemed very appealing this morning though.

“Park!” You decide enthusiastically.

“Alright!” Mr. Ross said giving you a high five. “When we’re done with breakfast we’ll get ready a go to the park down the street.”

With that you eagerly devour your breakfast. The two adults chuckle at your enthusiasm. “How about you go play in your room while we finish eating.” Mrs. Ross suggested.

With that you and Teddy head back upstairs to your room. Your content to play with your blocks for a while and before long Mrs. Ross is coming in to get you ready for the day.

Then the three of you are walking down the street headed for the park. You hand is firmly in Mrs. Ross’s but your used to it by now.

When you arrive your surprised at how many other people are there. Does someone recognize you while your there?
1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.title: Park

choices: Stay with Mr and Mrs Ross
1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.content:
You have fun playing for an hour or so before you notice some people who look very familiar watching you. Your stomach sinks when you realize it’s your sister and a couple of her friends.

You wonder what would be best. Keep playing and pretend you didn’t know them in the hopes they don’t approach you or head over to the Rosses for protection from the bullying that your sure is about to happen.

You aren’t given a chance to make a decision however because as soon as they see that you’ve seen them they’re headed over. As they close ranks around you, you become hyper aware of what your wearing.

You were in overalls today because they were good to play in but your diaper created a bulge that was obvious. There was no way your soon to be tormentors wouldn’t have noticed.

“I didn’t believe it when I first saw it.” Your sister smirks. “But I was right my big sister is just a little baby.”

“I’m not a baby!” You shoot back stomping your foot for emphasis but even as you say it the words sound hollow.

“Ohhh! Is the baby grumpy?” One of your sisters friends say in mock concern. “Maybe she needs a diaper change.”

“Or a nap.” Another one suggests.

“It’s not nap time.” You say reflexively and your sister and her friends burst out laughing.

“So you do need a change.” Your sister says.

“No.” You say but your unsure. You have no idea what kind of state your diaper is in. This is your 3rd day in diapers full time and Mrs Ross checks you so often you don’t need to ever ask for a change.

“I think the baby is lying.” The first friend says seriously. “We should probably check to make sure she doesn’t get a rash.”

“I think your right. It would be wrong to just leave the cranky baby in a used diaper.” The second say with an evil grin.

Your sister swiftly unbuckles your overalls and they drop to the ground before you can react. Your diaper in full view your relieved to see that at the very least your dry but it only lasts a second cause the cool air seems to be all your bladder needs to release itself into your waiting diaper.

You start to tear up in humiliation as your sister and her friends roar in laughter. Tears start to roll down your cheeks and you slip your thumb to your mouth for comfort sucking on it a few times. Then as though following a cue from your bladder your bowels cut loose and your helplessly messing yourself.

“Wow Isabelle, you really are just a baby aren’t you.” Your sister says. You just continue to cry sucking on your thumb desperately.

She rolls her eyes and then picks your overalls up and clips them back on. “There now no one can see what a baby you are.” But it doesn’t stop your tears. She sighs exasperated. “Come on lets go get the baby changed.” She starts to walk away and her friends follow but stops and grabs your hand when she realizes you aren’t following.

“Where are your diapers?” Your sister asks you shortly.

Your tears are slowing now that you know your going to be changed. You scan the crowd of parents and then point out Mr. and Mrs. Ross. Words are suddenly very difficult and you really just want to be held.

Your sisters friends hang back while your sister leads you over to the two adults. Once Mrs. Ross sees you she gets moves towards you and scoops up up into her arms. “What’s the matter little one? Did you get hurt?” She asks.

“Are you taking care of her?” Your sister asks curiously.

“Yes, she’s staying with me.” Mrs. Ross answers rocking you gently as you bury your face into her. And wrap the arm that isn’t attached to the thumb in your mouth around her neck. She pulls your thumb out and you whine. She’s never had a problem with you sucking your thumb before. “Don’t do that little one, your hand is all dirty from playing.” She says to you.

She pulls something out of her pocket and holds it up to your mouth and as it brushes your lips you open to accept it. After a couple of sucks you register that it’s a pacifier. You decide you like it better than your thumb right now because it means both hands are free to hold onto your caretaker.

“I think you need a change.” Mrs. Ross coos.

“Icky.” You confirm. You feel safe in her arms and your episode with your sister and her friends is all but forgotten despite the fact that she’s still standing right there.

“Let’s get you all cleaned up and then you can play for a bit more before it’s time to head home.”

“Everything alright?” Mr Ross asks the three of you.

“Just fine Ron.” Mrs. Ross says. “I’m going to get the little one cleaned up could you get me her bag.”

He hands it over and then the two of you head to the family bathrooms. When you come out holding Mrs. Ross’s hand your sister is standing outside.

“Are you friends with Isabelle?” Mrs Ross asks her.

“I’m her big sister.” She answers and her smile suggests she’s enjoying the joke. You do the mature thing and stick your tongue out at her in response.

“Well thank you for bringing her to me.” Mrs. Ross says to her. Then she asks you “Ready to go play some more?” You hesitate. You do want to play but your not eager to go back to being teased by you sister and her friends.
1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.title: Your sister and her friends

1212121321331311223222221121121113111312.content:
You decide that they probably have had their fun at your expense. “Yeah.” You answer around your pacifier, voice a bit distorted from the plastic guard.

Your sister sticks close and Mrs. Ross leads you back to the playground and retreats to her husband leaving you alone with your sister.

You eye her nervously and she rolls her eyes. “Relax it’s one thing to make fun of you for acting like a baby. It’s different when you actually ARE a baby.”

You don’t really understand the difference but you think it means that she won’t be causing you anymore trouble. “Thanks I think.” You say.

“Don’t get me wrong.” She continues. “I still find it amusing that my 18 year old sister is dressed and acting like a baby. Aren’t you supposed to be an adult? How did you even end up with those two people?”

You think about how to answer her first question. Finally you say “Mr and Mrs Ross say I don’t have to be a big girl if I’m not ready. You and your friends saw for yourself.”

She chokes back a laugh at your words. “No I guess you aren’t ready if you wet and mess your pants like that.”

“I didn’t. I just used my diaper. That’s why I’m wearing one. So I don’t have accidents.” You inform her matter of factly.

She doesn’t seem to know how to respond for a moment. “You didn’t start wearing diapers today did you? Cause there’s no way your this ok with being in a diaper and using it in front of people if you’ve only been wearing a couple hours.”

You hesitate not sure how honest you should be. Your pretty sure you won’t be re-potty trained by the time your mom comes home. You might as well be honest as far as your diaper wearing goes.

“This is the third day I’ve been in diapers full time.” You admit. “I haven’t used the potty in three days just my diaper. Mrs. Ross doesn’t mind changing me though. Like I said she says I’m not ready to be a big girl.”

“You’ve only been wearing for 3 days and what you lost your toilet training?!”

“No I think I might have lost my potty training first and then she put me in diapers. I had a few accidents in my pull-ups before she decided that I wasn’t ready and put me back in diapers I haven’t made it to the potty since.”

“Pull-ups?”

“I had an accident at school so they said I needed to wear pull-ups until they knew I could stay dry. I couldn’t.”

“So how did you end up with Mrs Ross isn’t she the kindergarten teacher?”

“Yes. I’m staying with her while mom is gone.” You say carefully but suddenly you want her to know just how great Mrs Ross is and everything that the two of you have been doing for the past two days comes spilling out of you. How she read to you at night how gently she bathed you and dressed you like you were fragile and precious. How she never made you feel bad about using your diapers and held you while you broke down crying as she soothed you. How she made you feel warm and safe and small. You told her about your room with her and all your toys and about Teddy your friend and the adventures the two of you had.

“Ok” Your sister says putting her hands up. “She’s the perfect mommy for my big baby sister.”

“I not a baby.” You try to assert. “I’s a big girl.”
